meanings.definition: The position or status of being a queen.
meanings.sent1: In the fairy tale, the princess dreamed of achieving queenships one day.
meanings.sent2: Her queenships was marked by grace and wisdom.
meanings.sent3: The play depicted a comical mix-up where a frog claimed queenships by mistake.
meanings.sent4: Her queenships over the land was like a gentle breeze, bringing peace and prosperity.
meanings.sent5: The queenships of the powerful ruler was evident in every decision she made.

meanings.definition: The reign or rule of a queen.
meanings.sent1: During her queenships, the kingdom prospered and flourished.
meanings.sent2: The queenships of Queen Elizabeth I is remembered as a golden era.
meanings.sent3: The queenships of the cat over the house involved lots of napping and treats.
meanings.sent4: Her queenships was a beacon of hope in times of darkness.
meanings.sent5: The queenships of the sun over the sky brought warmth and light to all.
